translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

It not being proper to take any single item from the National Estates, formerly those of the extinct Jesuits in the Missions, I thus inform Your Lordship José Antônio da Silva, who should be apprehended with cattle belonging to the enemy.

God keep Your Lordship  
Treasury Secretariat in Piratini, July 26, 1838  
(a) Domingos José de Almeida.

Most Illustrious Sir Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima — General Commander of the Police of the Municipality and Frontier of Alegrete.
